languages.text: {n}Глаза Винтерскейла проясняются и, едва бросив взгляд на Серого Вортена, он отшатывается.{/n} "Я... я вижу! Скверна. Она окутывает его. Она окутывает... меня?"
{n}Calligos's eyes slowly clear. He turns to look at Worten the Grey and immediately recoils.{/n} "I... I see it! The corruption, like a cloak around him... and around me?"
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза Винтерскейла проясняются и, едва бросив взгляд на Серого Вортена, он отшатывается.{/n} "Я... я вижу! Скверна. Она окутывает его. Она окутывает... меня?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale's eyes clear up and he recoils after barely giving a glance to Worten the Grey.{/n} "I... I see! Corruption! In is enveloping him... and me?"
{n}Winterscale's eyes clear up and he recoils after barely giving a glance to Worten the Grey.{/n} "I... I see! Corruption! In is enveloping him... and me?"
{n}Winterscale's eyes clear up, and he recoils after barely giving a glance to Worten the Grey.{/n} "I... I see! Corruption! It is enveloping him... and me?"
{n}Winterscale's eyes clear up, and he recoils after barely giving a glance to Worten the Grey.{/n} "I... I see! Corruption! It is enveloping him... and me?"
{n}Calligos's eyes slowly clear. He turns to look at Worten the Grey and immediately recoils.{/n} "I... I see it! The corruption, like a cloak around him... and around me?"
{n}Calligos's eyes slowly clear. He turns to look at Worten the Grey and immediately recoils.{/n} "I... I see it! The corruption, like a cloak around him... and around me?"

languages.text: {n}La mirada de Winterscale se aclara. Se gira hacia Worten el Gris y retrocede al verlo.{/n} «¡La... la veo! ¡Corrupción! Lo envuelve por completo... ¿y a mí también?».
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos's eyes slowly clear. He turns to look at Worten the Grey and immediately recoils.{/n} "I... I see it! The corruption, like a cloak around him... and around me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La mirada de Winterscale se aclara, y el Comerciante Independiente retrocede tras lanzar una fugaz mirada a Worten el Gris.{/n} «¡Lo... lo veo! ¡Corrupción! Lo envuelve por completo... ¿y a mí también?».

languages.text: {n}卡里戈斯的眼神慢慢变得清醒过来。他转过身，看了一眼身边的灰斑沃尔腾，随后立刻畏缩起来。{/n}“我……我看到了！腐化就像斗篷一样缠绕着他……还有我？”
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos's eyes slowly clear. He turns to look at Worten the Grey and immediately recoils.{/n} "I... I see it! The corruption, like a cloak around him... and around me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}温特斯凯尔的目光忽然变得清晰起来。他仅仅瞥了灰斑沃尔腾一眼，就立刻朝后退了几步。{/n}“我……我看到了！是腐化！它包裹着他……还有我？”

languages.text: {n}Le regard de Calligos retrouve peu à peu sa lucidité. Il se tourne vers Worten le Gris, puis fait immédiatement un pas en arrière.{/n} « Je... je la vois ! La corruption, elle l'enveloppe comme un manteau... et moi aussi ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos's eyes slowly clear. He turns to look at Worten the Grey and immediately recoils.{/n} "I... I see it! The corruption, like a cloak around him... and around me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard de Calligos retrouve peu à peu sa lucidité. Il se tourne vers Worten le Gris, puis fait immédiatement un pas en arrière.{/n} « Je... je la vois ! La corruption, elle l'enveloppe comme un manteau... et moi aussi ? »

languages.text: {n}カリゴスの目がゆっくりと澄んでいく。彼はヴォルテン・ザ・グレイを見ると、すぐさま飛び退いた。{/n}「み…見えたぞ！腐敗だ、マントのように取り巻いて…俺までも包んでいるだと？」
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos's eyes slowly clear. He turns to look at Worten the Grey and immediately recoils.{/n} "I... I see it! The corruption, like a cloak around him... and around me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}カリゴスの目がゆっくりと澄んでいく。彼はヴォルテン・ザ・グレイを見ると、すぐさま飛び退いた。{/n}「み…見えたぞ！腐敗だ、マントのように取り巻いて…俺までも包んでいるだと？」

languages.text: {n}Calligos' Augen werden langsam klar. Er wendet sich zu Worten dem Grauen um und zuckt zusammen.{/n} "Ich ... Ich sehe sie! Die Verderbnis, wie ein Umhang hüllt sie ihn ein ... und mich?"
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos's eyes slowly clear. He turns to look at Worten the Grey and immediately recoils.{/n} "I... I see it! The corruption, like a cloak around him... and around me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterzunders Augen klaren auf, und er schreckt zurück, nachdem er Worten den Grauen nur kurz angeblickt hat.{/n} "Ich ... Ich verstehe! Verderbnis! Sie umhüllt ihn ... und mich?"

languages.text: {n}Calligos'un gözleri yavaşça aydınlanıyor. Gri Worten'a bakmak için dönmesiyle birlikte geri çekiliyor.{/n} "Ben... Görüyorum. Yozlaşma, pelerin gibi etrafını sarmış. Benim... Etrafımı da mı sarmış?"
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos's eyes slowly clear. He turns to look at Worten the Grey and immediately recoils.{/n} "I... I see it! The corruption, like a cloak around him... and around me?"
